analysis.summary: Very low probability of skin cancer
analysis.advice: The analysis indicates a very low probability of skin cancer. Continue regular skin checks and maintain a healthy skincare routine.
analysis.next_steps: It's still important to perform regular skin checks and seek medical advice if any unusual changes occur.

analysis.advice: The analysis indicates a moderate to high probability of skin cancer. It is strongly recommended to consult a dermatologist for further tests and a comprehensive evaluation.
analysis.next_steps: Seek immediate medical advice and consider a biopsy or other diagnostic tests.
